1569260.name: Captain Coffer 2D Demo
1569260.description:
Captain Coffer 2D is an arcade platformer starring a real, immortal treasure of a hero. Race against the clock while also overcoming puzzling obstacles in the first four stages from the full-length game. Discover the powers of doubloons and lost magic, and try the demo today!

  • Features the first four stages from the base game to try for free.
  • Hop, blast, and unlock the first power-up... the MAGIC KEY.
  • Delve into the MYSTIC CASTLES and learn what this small adventure is about.
